kerch

Hat Kernel

Class

Examples

Linear (Time)

import kerch
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

k = kerch.kernel.hat(sample=range(10), lag=3)
plt.imshow(k.K)
plt.colorbar()
plt.title("Hat with lag " + str(k.lag))

(Source code)
